rule: Once you have their money... you never give it back.
The best way to get rid of a problem is to make it someone else's problem.
Never let the competition know what you're thinking.
The customer is always right... until you get their money.
If you can't make a profit, don't do it.
Never underestimate the power of greed.
Never trust anyone who doesn't have something to hide.
The only thing better than a good deal is a bad deal for someone else.
If you can't beat them, cheat them.
